1.0.name: wordpress/wp-social-networks-widget
1.0.description:
Display Font Awesome Icons of social network sites that linkback to social network profiles.

Supports following icons:

  • Facebook
  • Google+
  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn
  • Github
  • Flickr
  • YouTube
  • RSS
  • Bitbuckete
  • Instagram
  • Pinterest

The approach presented here is simply superior to any other approach.

  • Colors can be adjusted with CSS3, with gradients and all that bling bling
  • Scalable graphics
  • High DPI ("retina") compatible
  • Simple HTML markup: just . No CSS sprite preprocessing or other workflow complications needed
  • Can be animated with CSS3 transitions
  • Easily match the link text color for monotone icons
  • FontAwesome is served from CDN
  • Works with legacy browsers (IE7+)
